sentences.en: Compare spray, shower, spatter, splatter, splash and slosh.
sentences.cn: 试比较spray 、 shower 、 spatter 、 splatter 、 splash、slosh的 用法.

sentences.en: Devils don't slosh around much of a Sunday, I don't reckon. "
sentences.cn: 我猜想, 真是星期天鬼是不怎么四处游荡的. ”

sentences.en: Don't slosh the paint on so thickly, they want a nice smooth surface.
sentences.cn: 别把油漆胡乱刷得这么厚, 他们要求外表光滑美观.

sentences.en: Don't slosh too much water on the floor when you're having a bath.
sentences.cn: 洗澡时别把太多水溅到地板上.

sentences.en: Include orders not to stand on top of thetoilet seat and defaecate, then use water bottles to slosh on oneself.
sentences.cn: 以及要求人们不要站在马桶座圈上排便，也不要用水瓶把水溅在自己身上。

sentences.en: No slosh for me. Just plain water.
sentences.cn: 我不喝酒,来杯白开水就可以了.

sentences.en: That leaves the risk of letting too much liquidity slosh around the system.
sentences.cn: 由此也就剩下了美联储会让金融体系充斥着太多流动性的风险.

sentences.en: The main effect is to raise the fundamental slosh mode frequency.
sentences.cn: 主要作用是提高基本的晃动频率.

sentences.en: The slosh mass locations move considerably aft of the c . g . of the vehicle.
sentences.cn: 晃动质量位置移至飞行器重心之后很多了.

sentences.en: The slosh problem is examined in detail in latter chapters.
sentences.cn: 晃动问题在后面的章节中将详细地解释.

sentences.en: Wrongly applied credit can slosh around , drive up costs and create excess capacity.
sentences.cn: 不正当地利用信用随处可见, 这就抬升了成本,创造了过度的生产量.

words.tran_cn: 搅动；痛饮；艰难行进；发出溅水声（slosh的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: （尤指钱）大量存在，涉水而行，（液体）（在容器里）晃荡作响，（在液体里）出声地四处移动
